name: Trident Books & Cafe
description: Warm, lively space with vintage posters and large communal tables — ideal for writing groups.

name: George Howell Coffee
description: Artisanal coffee shop with minimalist design and quiet atmosphere perfect for focused work sessions.

name: Fenway Community Center
description: Spacious community room with flexible seating arrangements and excellent acoustics for group discussions.

name: JP Licks
description: Cozy neighborhood cafe with local art on the walls and comfortable seating for casual meetups.

name: Cambridge Public Library
description: Modern library with private meeting rooms and quiet study areas, perfect for educational groups.

name: Pao Arts Center
description: Cultural arts center with gallery space and flexible seating, ideal for creative workshops and cultural events.

name: Le Petit Space
description: Intimate French-inspired cafe with charming decor and perfect lighting for photography groups.

name: Artists for Humanity EpiCenter
description: Contemporary art space with high ceilings and natural light, perfect for maker groups and creative collaborations.

name: The Well Coffee House
description: Community-focused coffee shop with large tables and welcoming atmosphere for study groups and networking.

name: Brookline Booksmith
description: Independent bookstore with cozy reading nooks and community event space, perfect for book clubs and literary discussions.

name: Somerville Community Center
description: Large multipurpose room with kitchen facilities and flexible layout options for community events and workshops.

name: Blue Bottle Coffee
description: Minimalist coffee shop with clean lines and excellent lighting, ideal for design-focused meetups and presentations.
